Loop_2: * Draw a circle with a center at (0.216, 0.216) and a radius of 0.1178, inside Loop_1. Scale the 2D sketch of face_1 by a factor of 0.4319. Transform the scaled 2D sketch into a 3D sketch using the euler angles and translation vector defined in the coordinate system. Extrude the 2D sketch to generate the 3D model with the following properties: * Extrusion depth towards normal: 0.0393 * Extrusion depth opposite normal: 0.0 * Sketch scale: 0.4319 * Operation: JoinFeatureOperation The height, width, and length of this part are: * Height: 0.4319 * Width: 0.0393 * Length: 0.4319 Final Shape Instructions The final shape is a cylindrical object with a flat top and bottom, and a slightly tapered middle section. It also has a central hole that slightly curves along its length and is slightly tapered in the middle section. To create the final shape, perform a boolean operation (IntersectFeatureOperation) between part\\_1 and part\\_2. The combined part will have the shape and dimensions mentioned in the "final\\_shape" section of the JSON. The height, width, and length of the final shape are: * Height: 0.589 * Width: 0.1178 * Length: 0.589</description>
